cards.name: Smalljon Umber
cards.text:
Renown.
Smalljon Umber gets -1 STR for each plot card in your used pile.

cards.name: No Surprises
cards.text: Action: Reveal your hand (of at least 1 card). Then, until the end of the phase, each opponent cannot play events or bring cards out of shadows.

cards.name: Shadow of the Wall
cards.text: Shadow (0). Choose and stand a character with 1 or fewer challenge icons. If there is a Winter plot card revealed, return Shadow of the Wall to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Red Keep Gaoler
cards.text: Shadow (4). Action: Move 2 power from your faction card to a [baratheon] character to put Red Keep Gaoler into play from shadows.

cards.name: The Regent's Guard
cards.text: Shadow (4). Action: Return a [lannister] non-Ally character with printed cost 4 or higher to your hand to put The Regent's Guard into play from shadows.

cards.name: Shadow of the East
cards.text: Shadow (0). Choose an attachment and discard it from play. If there is a Summer plot card revealed, return Shadow of the East to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Shadow of the South
cards.text: Shadow (1). Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. If there is a Scheme plot card revealed, return Shadow of the South to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Shadow Politics
cards.text: Shadow (1). Action: Choose one: - Choose and discard 1 card from shadows. - Choose up to 5 cards in a single discard pile and remove them from the game. - Look at an opponent's hand.
